name: Formation
text:
Part III.  SPONSORED CAPTIVE INSURANCE COMPANIES
 
     [§431:19-301]  Formation.  (a)  One or more sponsors may form a sponsored captive insurance company under this part.  In addition to the general provisions of this article, the provisions of this part shall apply to sponsored captive insurance companies.
     (b)  A sponsored captive insurance company shall be incorporated as a stock insurer with its capital divided into shares and held by the stockholders, as a nonprofit corporation with one or more members, or as a member-managed or manager-managed limited liability company.
